entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -17.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 2:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -17.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -24.0°C
Wind: W 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
